matched_rules: Missing Travel Rule Information for Cross-Border Transfer
Failure to File Suspicious Transaction Report
explanation: The transaction breaches several MAS Notice 626 clauses: suspicion was flagged only after the transaction was booked (Clause 6.2), KYC was not completed before the transaction (Clause 6.3), cross‑border wire transfer details (originator address/ID) required for amounts >S$1,500 are missing (Clause 11), a potential sanctions hit was identified (Clause 6.39‑6.42), and there is no evidence of a Suspicious Transaction Report being filed (Clause 14). These combined violations elevate the risk to high.
